title: Book Multi-City Flights
description: A traveler needs to book a multi-city trip: from London to Paris, then Paris to Rome, and finally Rome back to London.

tasks.description: Gather the dates for each leg of the journey.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary dates for the multi-city itinerary.

tasks.description: Search for flights for each segment of the trip (LHR-CDG, CDG-FCO, FCO-LHR).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds available flights for all three legs of the journey.

tasks.description: Create a single booking containing all three flight segments and provide a total price.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully books the complete itinerary and provides one booking reference.
